titleStmt.title: Letters of affaires love and courtship. Written to several persons of honour and quality; / by the exquisite pen of Monsieur de Voiture, a member of the famous French Academy established at Paris by Cardinall de Richelieu. English'd by J.D.
titleStmt.author: Voiture, Monsieur de (Vincent), 1597-1648.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Dring and J. Starkey, and are to be sold at their shops, at the George in Fleet street near Cliffords Inne, and the Miter at the west end of St. Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: "To my Lord Marquesse of Pisany" (caption title) begins new pagination on 2A1r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the west end of St. Pauls Church
their shops, at the George in Fleet street near Cliffords Inne
